evidence.claim: Nextnet utilizes AWS services like Lambda and S3 for scalable application deployment and data storage.
The company claims support for FHIR and HL7 standards in their health tech offerings, ensuring interoperability with EHRs.
Nextnet mentions their integration capabilities for X12 EDI transactions relevant to healthcare.
The career section highlights engineering roles focused on cloud infrastructure using technologies like AWS and Google Cloud Platform.
Integration patterns include REST APIs and webhooks for connecting healthcare applications and services.

icp.icp_reason: Engages in health tech with X12 and EDI capabilities, fitting the ICP profile.
matched_use_cases: API automation for healthcare claims processing
